name: IInterativa
tag_list: andre-lima-cardoso, digital-marketing, digital-strategy, web-solution, webdesign, social-media, internet, infobase, netpartner, iinterativa, sales, solutions, services, projects
overview:
The IInterativa is Infobase brand. Born of a IT Consulting company, Infobase, one of the 50 largest integrator of Information Technology in Brazil, according to the Yearbook “Informatica Hoje”. We see ourselves as the result of the meeting of technology with creativity.

Our mission is using technology as a creative tool to connect people, stimulate collaboration and improve our customers’ businesses.

Work as a team with our partners to create a great place to work and achieve objectives; stimulate creative actions and initiatives of our employees, seeking always evolve our professional performance and improve our relation with our clients are part our vision. We value those search for information and new knowledge and apply them in your routine, combining the pursuit of intellectual growth with professional achievement.

Aiming to create new business opportunities by increasing the visibility of your company, IInterativa enables the perfect interaction between your website, search engines, and the expression of the intention of your target audience. Through an in-depth study of marketing systems Search or Search Engine Optimization (SEO) our work has the facility to increase the reach of campaigns regardless of their business sector.

In collaboration with environments or tools like Canvas, Corporate Social Networking, Facebook, Social Sites based images (Pinterest, Instagram, Flickr and Polyvore), Google+, Youtube, Twitter, LinkedIn and Blogs can extract maximum collective intelligence to deliver of our work. But it’s no use just deliver the work, it’s also necessary monitor developments and monitor all developments. This way, it feeds creativity, pushing new attitudes. To accomplish this, we delve into tools like Google Analytics, Omniture, Piwik and other frameworks to analyze your environment. We provide quantitative and qualitative information to empower your team to help you make smarter decisions.

We track the fast pace that mobile devices are evolving and becoming an essential tool for business innovations. We bring to our clients the experience of a strategic and technical agency for the mobile environment. An efficient and mobile strategy for your organization is the foundation of success for this type of project. We have a team that can engage leaders, middle management and support staff of your business.

Our company understands that all our work in various online environments should be governed in the guise of our clients, sharing creativity and expertise. For this, we start from the point that great works of design help build brands, connect businesses and customers and generate business. In Infobase Interactive, we believe that digital design is much more than a layout. We have created a methodology for building interfaces based on theoretical concepts, but that keeps pragmatism. With it, the output result is faster and more efficient than the parts designed freely.

Our technology solutions are developed and guaranteed by Infobase, a leading technology integrator in Brazil. As we are one company, the workflow is facilitated and expanded range of solutions. We are able to deliver solutions that a traditional agency cannot develop alone.
